title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU & Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party async/sync Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as Python client.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration to treat Ollama as an LLM or chat model with history, tools, RAG, agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat threads, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-style endpoint.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, chat, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-cli (adamcohen/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive REPL with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot (cmgriffing/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a Copilot-style inline code assistant.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Lightweight RAG pipeline using llama.cpp embeddings & Ollama for generation.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and chat completions.

title: ollama-helm (valentin-helm/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-rust (mdrokz/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate for Ollama REST API; chat, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-dagger (grouville/dagger-ollama)
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-vscode (olimorris/ollama-vscode)
summary: VS Code extension: chat sidebar, code explain, refactor, unit-test via Ollama.

title: ollama-node (cheshire-cat-ml/ollama-node)
summary: Community Node.js client with additional helpers for embeddings and tools.

title: ollama-rails (railsjazz/ollama-rails)
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama API for Rails apps; chat, completions, model management.

title: ollama-docker-compose (sugarforever/ollama-docker-compose)
summary: Ready-to-run docker-compose with Ollama, Open-WebUI, qDrant, and RAG example.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization & Q&A.

title: ollama-discord (tekumara/ollama-discord)
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels with slash commands.
